Name: Navigation Data
Description:
Encoded navigation data. This highly portable data unit contains all relevant cartographical information for a planetary region.

May be traded with a Cartographer aboard a Space Station in exchange for usable star charts.

Name: Exosuit Upgrade Chart
Description:
Encoded navigation data which, when properly decrypted, will reveal the location of a Drop Pod containing an Exosuit Inventory Upgrade.

Select the coordinates in the inventory and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

Name: Log Encryption Key
Description:
A fragment of the encryption override sequence for a freighter's emergency log.

Several parts of the sequence may be required to gain full access to recorded data.

Name: Atlaspass V1
Description:
Security and permissions pass granted to specific travellers by many primary galactic species.

Provides access to low level restricted areas and outpost systems.

Name: Atlaspass V2
Description:
Security and permissions pass granted to specific travellers by many primary galactic species.
 
Provides access to mid-tier restricted areas and outpost systems.

Name: Atlaspass V3
Description:
Security and permissions pass granted to specific travellers by many primary galactic species.
 
Provides access to high level restricted areas and outpost systems.

Name: Defence Chit
Description: A token, entitling the bearer to support from the system authorities in dealing with pirate attacks.

Name: Salvaged Data
Description:
The salvageable heart of some ancient technology. Unreadable in its current form.

These databanks can be spent at a Construction Research Unit and used to research new Construction Blueprints.

Name: Factory Override Unit
Description:
A portable data unit, compatible with most planetary fabricator facilities.

Once access has been gained to a central control terminal, the Override Unit can divert the facilities resources towards researching new product recipes.

Name: Salvaged Frigate Module
Description:
A technology module harvested from the remains of a large interstellar starship. May be collected from freighter crashsites or salvaged during frigate expeditions.

Useless in its current form, a Research Station aboard your freighter may be able to convert it into useable technology.

Name: Storage Augmentation
Description:
A technology module harvested from the remains of a salvaged starship. May also be collected from freighter crash sites or salvaged during frigate expeditions.

Can be used to expand starship storage capacity at the Space Station's Starship Outfitter.

Name: Cargo Bulkhead
Description:
A technology module harvested from the remains of an abandoned freighter found floating in space. May also be salvaged during frigate expeditions.

Pre-packed nano-expanders fill out this portable unit and graft it to an existing freighter, increasing its inventory capacity. Apply at your freighter's Upgrade Terminal.

Name: Multi-tool Expansion Slot
Description:
A flexible upgrade circuit, compatible with all person Multi-Tools.

This module can be wired into a Multi-Tool at a Space Station Multi-Tool Upgrade Rack, granting the user more space in the Multi-Tool's internal layout to add further upgrades or technology specialisations.

Name: Exosuit Expansion Unit
Description:
An advanced survival technology module that allows expansion of a user's Exosuit Storage.

Pre-packed nano-expanders create stablised sub-warp voids within the Exosuit, increasing its inventory capacity. Apply this augmentation at the Exosuit upgrade terminal on board a Space Station.

Name: Spawning Sac
Description:
An additional storage nodule for Sentient starships. Upon hatching, the parasite inside this sac is grafted upon the vessel, exchanging the use of its cavernous innards for vital nutrients from the host.

Use FE_ALT1 to trigger growth and begin the hatching process.

Name: Psychonic Egg
Description:
A writhing sac of genetic fluid, designed to foster the creation of new bio-infused technology for a sentient starship.

The embryo will grow into bio-technology upgrade. Begin biogenesis with FE_ALT1.

Name: Memory Fragment
Description:
The shattered remnants of an expired traveller. It whispers, an unknowable name deep within its fibres.

The memory will manifest as an important technology upgrade to aid you on your travels. Absorb this memory with FE_ALT1.

Name: Minotaur Laser Module
Description:
A significant upgrade for the Minotaur Mining Laser. Use FE_ALT1 to begin upgrade installation process.

The module is flexible, and exact upgrade statistics are unknown until installation is complete.

Potential improvements include: mining power and/or heat dispersion.

Name: Minotaur Laser Module
Description:
An extremely powerful upgrade for the Minotaur Mining Laser. Use FE_ALT1 to begin upgrade installation process.

The module is flexible, and exact upgrade statistics are unknown until installation is complete.

Potential improvements include: mining power and/or heat dispersion.

Name: Minotaur Laser Module
Description:
A supremely powerful upgrade for the Minotaur Mining Laser. Use FE_ALT1 to begin upgrade installation process.

The module is flexible, and exact upgrade statistics are unknown until installation is complete.

Potential improvements include: mining power and/or heat dispersion.

Name: Minotaur Flamethrower Module
Description:
A significant upgrade for all Minotaur Flamethrower Units. Use FE_ALT1 to begin upgrade installation process.

The module is flexible, and exact upgrade statistics are unknown until installation is complete.

Potential improvements include: damage output, burn time and fuel efficiency.

Name: Minotaur Flamethrower Module
Description:
An extremely powerful upgrade for all Minotaur Flamethrower Units. Use FE_ALT1 to begin upgrade installation process.

The module is flexible, and exact upgrade statistics are unknown until installation is complete.

Potential improvements include: damage output, burn time and fuel efficiency.

Name: Minotaur Flamethrower Module
Description:
A supremely powerful upgrade for all Minotaur Flamethrower Units. Use FE_ALT1 to begin upgrade installation process.

The module is flexible, and exact upgrade statistics are unknown until installation is complete.

Potential improvements include: damage output, burn time and fuel efficiency.

Name: Minotaur Cannon Module
Description:
A significant upgrade for the Minotaur Mounted Cannon. Use FE_ALT1 to begin upgrade installation process.

The module is flexible, and exact upgrade statistics are unknown until installation is complete.

Potential improvements include: damage output, fire rate and heat dispersion.

Name: Minotaur Cannon Module
Description:
An extremely powerful upgrade for the Minotaur Mounted Cannon. Use FE_ALT1 to begin upgrade installation process.

The module is flexible, and exact upgrade statistics are unknown until installation is complete.

Potential improvements include: damage output, fire rate and heat dispersion.

Name: Minotaur Cannon Module
Description:
A supremely powerful upgrade for the Minotaur Mounted Cannon. Use FE_ALT1 to begin upgrade installation process.

The module is flexible, and exact upgrade statistics are unknown until installation is complete.

Potential improvements include: damage output, fire rate and heat dispersion.

Name: Exocraft Summoning Unit
Description:
A high-powered matter teleportation device, this personal translocator allows any connected Exocraft to be instantly transported to your location, from anywhere in the galaxy.

Interfaces with the Exosuit Quick Menu for ease of use.

Name: AUTO-TRAP
Description:
An autonomous fishing device, designed for long-term deployment in a wide-range of water conditions. Return later to collect trapped fish.

Trap cycle: IN PROGRESS

Name: Psychonic Egg
Description:
A writhing sac of genetic fluid, designed to foster the creation of new bio-infused technology for a sentient starship.

The embryo will grow into bio-technology upgrade. Begin biogenesis with FE_ALT1.

Name: Spawning Sac
Description:
An additional storage nodule for Sentient starships. Upon hatching, the parasite inside this sac is grafted upon the vessel, exchanging the use of its cavernous innards for vital nutrients from the host.

Use FE_ALT1 to trigger growth and begin the hatching process.

Name: Exosuit Upgrade Chart
Description:
Encoded navigation data which, when properly decrypted, will reveal the location of a Drop Pod containing an Exosuit Inventory Upgrade.

Select the coordinates in the inventory and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

Name: Memory Fragment
Description:
The shattered remnants of an expired traveller. It whispers, an unknowable name deep within its fibres.

The memory will manifest as an important technology upgrade to aid you on your travels. Absorb this memory with FE_ALT1.

Name: Teleport Chamber
Description:
Vital integrated freighter equipment. This personal teleport device allows the user to move quickly between their freighter, planetary bases, as well as any Space Station Terminuses connected to their network. User is urged to verify network integrity before inserting any matter they cannot afford to become separated from.

This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

Name: Base Computer
Description:
Portable land registration service.

When placed, contacts Universal Cartographic Archive to establish ownership of land. Successful registration allows the construction of base modules across any site of the user's choosing.

Name: Galactic Trade Terminal
Description: A trading terminal that provides instant local access to the market for resources and commodities.

Name: Health Station
Description: A wall mounted module that can be used to recharge health.

Name: Hazard Protection Unit
Description:
A wall mounted module that can be used to recharge the user's Hazard Protection systems.

The Hazard Protection Unit must be kept charged with a source of fuel.

Name: Save Beacon
Description:
Once activated, beacons provide a permanent navigational waypoint, facilitating repeat visits to specific locations.

Allows user to record their progress at any time.

Name: Signal Booster
Description:
A versatile scanner that detects nearby buildings. Can decrypt Navigation Data to pinpoint specific locations.

The Signal Booster can be dismantled and redeployed for easy transportation.

Name: Antimatter Reactor
Description:
An autonomous baryogenesis reactor, this device can be left to harvest reality paradoxes and convert them into usable antimatter. User must monitor fuel levels to ensure continued operation.

The resulting antimatter is safely contained, ready for use in all standard hyperspace power units.

Name: Base Teleport Module
Description:
A personal teleport device, allowing the user to move quickly between their constructed bases, as well as any Space Station Terminuses connected to their network.

User is urged to verify network integrity before inserting any matter they cannot afford to become separated from.

Name: Base Teleport Module
Description:
A personal teleport device, allowing the user to move quickly between their constructed bases, as well as any Space Station Terminuses connected to their network.

User is urged to verify network integrity before inserting any matter they cannot afford to become separated from.

Name: Construction Research Unit
Description:
Portable blueprint research device.

This field-deployable research module allows the user to convert old or damaged technology modules into advanced construction blueprints.

Name: Portable Refiner
Description:
A vital piece of planetary equipment. The Refiner allows gathered substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.

The Portable Refiner can be dismantled and redeployed for easy transportation. Note: the Portable Refiner requires fuel to operate.

Name: Medium Refiner
Description:
A vital piece of planetary equipment. The Refiner allows gathered substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.

The Medium Refiner allows two different substances to be combined into one new material, or materials to be processed at better ratios. 

The Medium Refiner must be installed in a Habitable Base, but does not require additional power sources.

Name: Large Refiner
Description:
A vital piece of planetary equipment. The Refiner allows gathered substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.

The Large Refiner allows three different substances to be combined into one new material, or materials to be processed at better ratios. 

The Large Refiner must be installed in a Habitable Base, but does not require additional power sources.

Name: Nutrient Processor
Description:
A portable nutrient extractor, able to process and refine gathered ingredients into edible food products.

User is advised that consumption of generated products is entirely at their own risk.

Name: Automated Feeder
Description:
A robotic farming unit, designed to automatically supply nearby creatures with food.

When powered, will attract nearby animal life. Keep bait tanks full in order to supply lifeforms with desired food.

Name: Livestock Unit
Description:
A robotic farming unit, designed to automatically harvest substances from creatures. Requires power.

Creatures that are ready to be harvested for milk, eggs or other specialist produce will approach the Livestock Unit and deposit their yields. The creatures are unharmed by the process.

Will harvest produce from creatures fed by hand or via an Automated Feeder.

Name: Message Module
Description: A small and accessible information container for leaving messages or viewing left messages and short strings of information.

Name: Communications Station
Description: A terminal for the composition and transmission of messages to other travellers.

Name: Nautilon Chamber
Description: An advanced, fully-airlocked docking station for the Nautilon submarine.

Name: Exocraft Summoning Station
Description:
Construction allows the user to summon any owned Exocraft from anywhere else in that system.

Interfaces with the Exosuit Quick Command Menu for ease of use. Can be compressed and carried within the Exosuit with DECONSTRUCT for later redeployment.

Name: Minotaur Geobay
Description:
A secure parking, summoning and customisation facility for the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid.

Deploy the Minotaur from the Quick Menu. With the aid of an Orbital Exocraft Materialiser mounted inside a freighter, the Minotaur can be instantly deployed to any location within the same system as the mothership.

Name: Science Terminal
Description: A research station tailored to the needs of Scientists, and equipped for research and development of scientific blueprints.

Name: Weapons Terminal
Description: A research station tailored to the needs of Armourers, and equipped for the development of munitions and explosives as well as selected civilian tech.

Name: Agricultural Terminal
Description: A research station tailored to the needs of Farmers, and equipped for the analysis and cultivation of farmable crops.

Name: Exocraft Terminal
Description: A research station tailored to the needs of Technicians, and equipped with bespoke vehicular design software.

Name: Construction Terminal
Description: A research station tailored to the needs of Construction Overseers, and equipped with architectural and engineering design software.

Name: Storage Container
Description: Spacious additional storage for inventory items.

Name: Storage Container
Description: Spacious additional storage for inventory items.

Name: Storage Container
Description: Spacious additional storage for inventory items.

Name: Storage Container
Description: Spacious additional storage for inventory items.

Name: Storage Container
Description: Spacious additional storage for inventory items.

Name: Storage Container
Description: Spacious additional storage for inventory items.

Name: Storage Container
Description: Spacious additional storage for inventory items.

Name: Storage Container
Description: Spacious additional storage for inventory items.

Name: Storage Container
Description: Spacious additional storage for inventory items.

Name: Storage Container
Description: Spacious additional storage for inventory items.

Name: Storage Container
Description: Spacious additional storage for inventory items.

Name: Race Initiator
Description: This platform acts as the start and finish line for Exocraft field tests, allowing Travellers to practice manoeuvring and speed.

Name: Starship Race Initiator
Description: This platform acts as the start and finish line for Starship field tests, allowing Travellers to practice manoeuvring and speed.

Name: Race Force Amplifier
Description: Provides a boost to your Exocraft during races.

Name: Race Obstacle
Description: Provides extra challenge for Exocraft races.

Name: Marine Shelter
Description:
An emergency survival module.

Can be rapidly deployed on the seabed in the event of an oxygen or other Exosuit life support emergency. Provides temporary shelter from environmental hazards, predators and other hostiles forces found in the deep ocean.

Name: Sphere Creator
Description:
A highly-specific fabrication device, developed with the intention of finding the universe's most perfect sphere.

Requires power to operate. Will create a large sphere, ready for whatever experiments are deemed necessary.

Name: Noise Box
Description:
A special construction module designed to emit a high-frequency noise. Pitch may be adjusted to the user's requirements.

Requires power to operate.

Name: Bytebeat Device
Description:
An advanced audio generator, allowing the user to synthesise complex musical arrangements.

Multiple devices may be placed in sequence or connected to lights to generate spectacular displays.

Name: Exosuit Research Station
Description:
This self-sufficient portable research station allows access to a range of technology upgrades.

Deploy this station within a base to begin upgrade selection process.

Name: Multi-tool Research Station
Description:
This self-sufficient portable research station allows access to a range of technology upgrades.

Deploy this station within a base to begin upgrade selection process.

Name: Exocraft Research Station
Description:
This self-sufficient portable research station allows access to a range of technology upgrades.

Deploy this station within a base to begin upgrade selection process.

Name: Ship Research Station
Description:
This self-sufficient portable research station allows access to a range of technology upgrades.

Deploy this station within a base to begin upgrade selection process.

Name: Utopia Exosuit Station
Description:
The Utopia Overseers wish for their brave settlers to be strong and well-equipped!

This officially-licensed portable research station allows access to a generous range of technology upgrades, easily purchased with the appropriate currency!

Construct and visit your own Utopia Exosuit Station today!

Name: Utopia Multi-tool Station
Description:
The Utopia Overseers wish for their brave settlers to be strong and well-equipped!

This officially-licensed portable research station allows access to a generous range of technology upgrades, easily purchased with the appropriate currency!

Construct and visit your own Utopia Multi-Tool Station today!

Name: Utopia Exocraft Station
Description:
The Utopia Overseers wish for their brave settlers to be strong and well-equipped!

This officially-licensed portable research station allows access to a generous range of technology upgrades, easily purchased with the appropriate currency!

Construct and visit your own Utopia Exocraft Station today!

Name: Utopia Ship Station
Description:
The Utopia Overseers wish for their brave settlers to be strong and well-equipped!

This officially-licensed portable research station allows access to a generous range of technology upgrades, easily purchased with the appropriate currency!

Construct and visit your own Utopia Starship Station today!

Name: Utopia Build Station
Description:
The Utopia Overseers wish for their brave settlers to be sheltered and happy! Together, we will make Bakkin beautiful!

This officially-licensed portable research station allows access to a generous range of construction blueprints, easily purchased with the appropriate currency!

Construct and visit your own Utopia Build Station today!

Name: Wonder Projector
Description:
A buildable holographic display, designed to visualise any discovery currently listed in your Personal Records.

Use the projector to manage these records directly, or view them from the Wonders section of the Catalogue.

Name: Oxygen Harvester
Description:
An autonomous atmosphere extractor, this device can be left to collect and purify oxygen from the air. User must monitor fuel levels to ensure continued operation.

The resulting gas is compressed and processed, ready for use in all standard life support systems.

Name: Autonomous Mining Unit
Description: An automated harvester for the mining of resources. Once activated, the AMU extracts minerals without the need for supervision, providing a regular yield until the site is exhausted.

Name: Atmosphere Harvester
Description: An automated siphon unit for the collection of valuable gases. Once activated, the harvester condenses and compresses substances from the air over time. Compressed gas is then stored safely until collected.

Name: Automated Trap
Description:
An autonomous fishing device, designed for long-term deployment in a wide-range of water conditions.

Once activated, the system will lure and trap any nearby aquatic creatures and store them for later retrieval.

Name: Mineral Extractor
Description:
An automated mineral harvester. Determine a site with the Surveying upgrade for the Analysis Visor. Mineral extraction rates and produced minerals will vary from site to site.

Requires power to function. Connect to Silos with Pipelines to allow collection from more convenient sites.

Name: Gas Extractor
Description:
An automated gas harvester. Determine a site with the Surveying upgrade for the Analysis Visor. Gas extraction rates and produced gases will vary from site to site.

Requires power to function. Connect to Silos with Pipelines to allow collection from more convenient sites.

Name: Supply Depot
Description:
Automated storage unit. Connect to a Supply Grid using Pipelines.

Automatically stores the output of various Mineral and Gas Extractors, allowing for increased capacity and more efficient siting. Can be located a long distances from the extraction site.

Name: Solar Panel
Description:
An efficient power generator, this solar array will turn sunlight into the electrical energy required to power many base structures.

Generates no power at night. Partner with Batteries to store energy for the hours of darkness.

Name: Electromagnetic Generator
Description:
When suitably placed in an area of high field strength, efficient electromagnetic dynamos are used to generate near limitless power.

Locate appropriate sites with the Surveying upgrade for the Analysis Visor. Power output will vary from site to site.

Name: Biofuel Reactor
Description:
A small power generator. Burns carbon-based fuel placed in its furnace tank and converts it into usable power.

Connect power generators to base structures and technologies with electrical wiring. Many parts require power to function.

Name: Electrical Wiring
Description:
High-capacity electrical wiring. Use wiring to connect Power Generators to your base. Most technology, as well as structures with embedded lighting systems, require a power source to operate.

Wiring can be connected to various switches to facilitate selective power flow.

Name: Teleport Cable
Description: Advanced fibre-optic cabling, designed to link one or more Short-Range Teleporters.

Name: Bytebeat Cable
Description:
Advanced cabling, designed to link one or more Bytebeat Generators or to connect a Bytebeat Switch to the network.

The signal will synchronize connected lights and device to the generated waveform.

Name: WALL SWITCH
Description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when pulled.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

Name: Floor Switch
Description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when stood upon or otherwise activated.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

Name: Battery
Description:
Highly-efficient energy storage units. Connect to a power grid, and onboard power management circuits will automatically draw down spare capacity to charge its cells.

When the grid attempts to draw more power than is currently supplied, the battery will automatically deploy power to make up the shortfall.

Name: Button
Description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when used.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

Name: Proximity Switch
Description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when an entity is detected nearby.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

Name: Supply Pipe
Description:
Flexible, high-strength piping. Able to withstand a highly-pressurised internal environment.

Used for connecting various Mineral and Gas Extractors to Silos

Name: Power Inverter
Description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when used.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

Name: Auto Switch
Description:
A power management device, this switch will toggle the flow of power when signaled by an incoming signal.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

Name: Short-range Teleporter
Description:
A low-powered teleporter, construction for instantaneous travel across short distances.

When wired to both a power source and another short-range teleporter, allows near-instant travel between nearby locations.

Name: Short-range Teleporter
Description:
A low-powered teleporter, construction for instantaneous travel across short distances.

When wired to both a power source and another short-range teleporter, allows near-instant travel between nearby locations.

Name: Bytebeat Switch
Description: A musical switching device, designed to interpret waveform signals generated by a Bytebeat Generator and output electrical impulses to connected lights and other devices.

Name: Electrical Cloaking Unit
Description:
Device to enable a wireless aesthetic in habitable bases.

Constructing the Electrical Cloaking Unit within a powered base will reduce the visual prominence of all local Electrical Wiring. Hidden wires will continue to supply electricity, provided they are sufficiently powered.
